definition: Stay a bit!/Wait a minute!/(to a departing guest) Take care!
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Horses should be walked for a while after a race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛后，应让马慢走一会儿。

sentences.english: Then you walk for 90 seconds again. And so on.
Every night, many elderly people walk in the park for half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 很多老年人在傍晚都会在公园慢走半个小时。

sentences.english: My parents are walking slowly along the path.
Since from thee going, he went wilful-slow.
sentences.chinese: 既然别你的时候它有意慢走。

sentences.english: To warm up for a brisk walk, walk slowly for five to 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 为快步走热身，那就慢走5到10分钟。

sentences.english: He always jogs for a long time in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 他经常早上慢走很长时间。

sentences.english: Take care and support services business wire work.
sentences.chinese: 并且配套服务慢走丝加工业务。

sentences.english: It fades the music down for a moment and tells you to stroll around for about 90 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 音乐淡出一会儿，程序告诉你慢走90秒钟左右。

sentences.english: I can make my horse go fast or slow at pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 我能随意使马快走或慢走。

definition: (said by departing guest) no need to see me out
to run fast/to sprint/to gallop/Gee up!/Run for it!
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
don't bother to see me out
to leave/to walk away/to beat it/to move aside
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
to get up/to leave/to set forth
you let me win (said politely after winning a game)
goodbye (modest formula)/Excuse me, I must leave.
to do as one pleases/to not inconvenience oneself
(of a watch or clock) to keep time/(physics) propagation time/travel time (of a wave)
